problem.markdown:
>>The origin for EMG is<< ( ) Skin muscle ( ) Heart muscle ( ) Nerve Muscle ( ) ECG and EOG
>>The electrode used for recording of electrical activity of cell is<< ( ) Floating electrode ( ) Disc electrode ( ) Needle electrode ( ) micro electrode
>>Among the following electrodes, which have high Zi?<< ( ) Surface electrodes ( ) Needle electrodes ( ) Micro electrodes ( ) Disc electrodes
>>The electrode used for recording of EMG is<< ( ) Micro electrode ( ) Floating elctrode ( ) Surface electrode ( ) None of above
>>The electromyograph (primary signal) voltage range is<< ( ) 10 to 10000 µV ( ) 20 to 5000 µV ( ) 10 to 350 µV ( ) None of above
